search_results.query: php convert special symbols to html

snippet.title: Infectonator 2
snippet.description: Infectonator 2 Strategy game. Raise a zombie army and try to infect all people in the world with the zombie virus.

snippet.title: Turret Tower Attack 2
snippet.description: Turret Tower Attack 2 Protect your turret and shoot all enemy units. Upgrade your tower and survive!

snippet.title: Elemental War
snippet.description: Elemental War Tower defense. Your fire army needs to protect the castle against the ice army attacks.

snippet.title: Toytown Tower Defense
snippet.description: Toytown Tower Defense Tower Defense game. Choose between three different heroes to assist your towers.

snippet.title: Total Robostruction
snippet.description: Total Robostruction Pick the items from the menu on top and build all sorts of robots as fast as you can.

snippet.title: Pixel Toilet
snippet.description: Pixel Toilet Arcade game. Make sure the dude on the toilet reaches the end of the level by launching him.

snippet.title: Lucky Tower 2
snippet.description: Lucky Tower 2 Platform adventure. As a lucky knight you must find and fight yourself a way through the tower!

snippet.title: Infectonator: World Dominator
snippet.description: Infectonator: World Dominator Kill people with your virus and earn money to mutate and infect the entire world.

snippet.title: Mass Mayhem 3
snippet.description: Mass Mayhem 3 More bloody carnage, more deadly weapons and new devious objects to destroy all in your path!

snippet.title: Seal of the Mainland
snippet.description: Seal of the Mainland Sidescrolling strategy. Control the soldiers in each row using attacks and special spells.
